channel.title: [Tool] grepWin Contents Renamer [Tool]
channel.description:
[size=36pt] :D :D :D grepWin Contents Renamer :D :D :D[/size]
This is a program to rename contents of files, say you were hosting a new server, and the old owner of the source has some commands to cheat, get money, make them self admin, it would be annoying.
This program can do the following... 1. Search a whole folder, so you don't have to look in each file seperatly. 2. Search for a word in CaSe SeNsItIvE. 3. Search for a line that doesn't match your search. 4. It can create a back-up file before searching. 5. It can treat files as a UTF8 (Whatever That Means :confused:)
And thats just a start, a screen shot will show you better then i can explain. A picture contains 1,000 words.
Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/6N5X2AGD
[size=18pt] NOTE: I did not make this file program am i claiming it as my own work, just basically releasing.[/size]

[size=36pt] grepWin Contents Renamer :D[/size]

This is a program to rename contents of files, say you were hosting a new server, and the old owner of the source has some commands to cheat, get money, make them self admin, it would be annoying.

This program can do the following…

  1. Search a whole folder, so you don’t have to look in each file seperatly.
  2. Search for a word in CaSe SeNsItIvE.
  3. Search for a line that doesn’t match your search.
  4. It can create a back-up file before searching.
  5. It can treat files as a UTF8 (Whatever That Means )

And thats just a start, a screen shot will show you better then i can explain.
A picture contains 1,000 words.
